title: Watchmen
creator_credit: John Blair, Karen Wacker, Warner Bros. Television and White Rabbit
brief_description: Set in an alternate history where superheroes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel while attempting to break new ground of its own.

constellations_other.name: The world's end
constellations_other.description: For people of colour oppressed by systemic racism, genre stories about the end of the world and cosmological monsters can be used to re-examine race and the injustices faced in real life.

creator_credit_for_label: John Blair, Karen Wacker, Warner Bros. Television and White Rabbit
description: Set in an alternate history where superheroes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel while attempting to break new ground of its own.
